name: The Wolf (itch) (Thomas Bringer)
description:
During the day, a man is being chased by hunters. At night, he turns into a werewolf and takes revenge.

Breaking news: A WEREWOLF INTO THE WILD. Hunters are seeking a werewolf attempting to escape the forest. Vulnerable at daytime, he becomes out of control at night. Traps have been placed, but he keeps disarming them at daytime.

Note: This game supports controller input. Feel free to play with a controller if you can.

Made in 48 hours by Thomas Bringer for GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control)
